title: Seychelles Inflation Rate
description: Inflation Rate in Seychelles decreased to 2.92 percent in October from 2.96 percent in September of 2022. Inflation Rate in Seychelles averaged 6.78 percent from 2003 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 63.25 percent in December of 2008 and a record low of -5.54 percent in March of 2010. In Seychelles, the inflation rate measures a broad rise or fall in prices that consumers pay for a standard basket of goods. This page provides - Seychelles Inflation Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: National Bureau of Statistics, Seychelles
